languages.text: {n}Кассия делает быстрый, нервный жест, поправляя скрывающее третий глаз украшение.{/n} "Я изучала записи прежнего {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} корабля. Хотела проверить маршрут до Даргонуса — и обнаружила, что он... совсем не соответствует тому, что указан в Атласе. Это даже не небольшая флуктуация {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} — маршрут просто стерт, им больше нельзя пользоваться. Что еще хуже — я стала проверять пути из Атласа один за другим, и везде видела ту же картину. Варп пронзила {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}грандиозная буря{/g}, заполонив его яркими, слепящими цветами. Это не помешает нам летать... но все прежние знания теперь бесполезны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия делает быстрый, нервный жест, поправляя скрывающее третий глаз украшение.{/n} "Я изучала записи прежнего {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} корабля. Хотела проверить маршрут до Даргонуса — и обнаружила, что он... совсем не соответствует тому, что указан в Атласе. Это даже не небольшая флуктуация {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} — маршрут просто стерт, им больше нельзя пользоваться. Что еще хуже — я стала проверять пути из Атласа один за другим, и везде видела ту же картину. Варп пронзила грандиозная буря, заполонив его яркими, слепящими цветами. Это не помешает нам летать... но все прежние знания теперь бесполезны".

languages.text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия делает быстрый, нервный жест, поправляя скрывающее третий глаз украшение.{/n} "Я изучала записи прежнего {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} корабля. Варп пронзила {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}грандиозная буря{/g}, заполонив его яркими, слепящими цветами. Это не помешает нам летать... но все прежние знания теперь бесполезны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the ornament over her third eye.{/n} "I was studying the records left by the vessel's previous navigator. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered it... does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor Warp fluctuation — the route had been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same picture everywhere. The Warp is roiling with an ominous storm, bursting with vivid and screaming colors. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

languages.text: {n}Cassia hace un gesto nervioso, ajustando el adorno que cubre su tercer ojo.{/n} «He estado estudiando los registros del anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} de la nave. Quería comprobar la ruta a Dargonus y he descubierto que... no se parece en nada a la registrada en el Atlas. Es mucho peor que una simple fluctuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}: la ruta ha sido arrasada y ya no sirve para viajar. Por si fuera poco, he consultado las otras rutas del Atlas, una tras otra, y he descubierto lo mismo. Una {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}terrible tormenta{/g} sacude la disformidad, llenándola de colores vivos y cegadores. No impedirá nuestro paso... pero toda la información que teníamos ha pasado a ser completamente inútil».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

Quería comprobar la ruta a Dargonus y he descubierto que... no se parece en nada a la registrada en el Atlas. Es mucho peor que una simple fluctuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}: la ruta ha sido arrasada y ya no sirve para viajar. Por si fuera poco, he consultado las otras rutas del Atlas, una tras otra, y he descubierto lo mismo. Una terrible tormenta sacude la disformidad, llenándola de colores vivos y cegadores. No impedirá nuestro paso... pero toda la información que teníamos ha pasado a ser completamente inútil».

languages.text: {n}卡西娅快速做了个紧张的手势，调整着第三只眼上面的装饰品。{/n}“我一直都在研究这艘飞船前任{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}留下的记录。当我检查通往达戈努斯的航线时，我发现它……与亚空间图册中记录的路线不一致。这并不只是小小的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}波动，而是整条航线都被抹除了，无法再用来航行。更糟糕的是，当我检查亚空间图册中的每条航线时，看到的都是同样的结果。亚空间中爆发了一场{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}可怕的风暴{/g}，迸发出刺眼的颜色。这些风暴并不会阻碍我们的航行……但之前积累下来的所有知识，如今都完全派不上用场了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅快速做了个紧张的手势，调整着第三只眼上面的装饰品。{/n}“我一直都在研究这艘飞船前任{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}留下的记录。当我检查通往达戈努斯的航线时，我发现它……与亚空间图册中记录的路线不一致。这并不只是小小的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}波动，而是整条航线都被抹除了，无法再用来航行。更糟糕的是，当我检查亚空间图册中的每条航线时，看到的都是同样的结果。亚空间中爆发了一场可怕的风暴，迸发出刺眼的颜色。这些风暴并不会阻碍我们的航行……但之前积累下来的所有知识，现在都完全派不上用场了。”

languages.text: {n}カシアは忙しなくソワソワと、第三の目の飾りを直している。{/n}「この宇宙船の前の{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が残した記録を詳しく確認いたしました。ダルゴナスへ向かうルートを改めて確認しようと思ったのですが、アトラスに記録されているルートと一致しません。ただの{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の揺らぎというよりも、ルートが全滅しているため、これ以上航行に使うのは不可能です。もっと最悪なのが、アトラスの道をひとつひとつ確認したところ、あちらこちらで同じ現象が確認できました。歪みは{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}不吉な嵐{/g}を伴ってうねり、鮮やかで騒々しい色を出して爆発しています。あたくし達の行動を邪魔するものではありませんが…これまでの知識は全く通用しなくなりますね」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

languages.text: {n}Cassia macht eine schnelle nervöse Geste und rückt die Verzierung über ihrem dritten Auge zurecht.{/n} "Ich habe die Unterlagen studiert, die der frühere {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} des Schiffs hinterlassen hat. Ich wollte die Route nach Dargonus noch einmal überprüfen und habe festgestellt, dass ... sie nicht mit der im Atlas übereinstimmt. Es handelt sich nicht um eine kleinere {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Fluktuation – die Route wurde gelöscht, sie kann für Reisen nicht mehr benutzt werden. Noch schlimmer ist, dass ich anschließend weitere Wege aus dem Atlas geprüft habe und wieder und wieder auf dasselbe Problem gestoßen bin, jedes Mal. Im Warp tobt ein {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}unheimlicher Sturm{/g}, voller greller und schreiender Farben. Unser Flug wird davon nicht beeinträchtigt ... aber alle bisherigen Kenntnisse sind nun völlig unbrauchbar."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

Im Warp tobt ein unheimlicher Sturm, voller greller und schreiender Farben. Unser Flug wird davon nicht beeinträchtigt ... aber alle bisherigen Kenntnisse sind nun völlig unbrauchbar."

languages.text: {n}Cassia ajuste l'ornement de son troisième œil d'un geste rapide qui trahit sa nervosité.{/n} « J'étudie actuellement les archives laissées par le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} précédent du vaisseau, et lorsque j'ai voulu vérifier l'itinéraire jusqu'à Dargonus, j'ai découvert qu'il... ne correspondait pas à celui de l'Atlas. Il ne s'agit pas simplement d'une fluctuation mineure du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} : l'itinéraire a été supprimé, il n'est plus possible de le suivre. Ce qui rend ce phénomène réellement inquiétant, c'est qu'après vérification des autres routes consignées dans l'Atlas, je me suis rendu compte qu'elles étaient toutes affectées. Le Warp est en proie à une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}tempête menaçante{/g} qui fulmine de couleurs vives et hurlantes. Ces conditions n'entravent pas nos déplacements... mais elles ont rendu toutes nos connaissances existantes absolument inutiles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia ajuste l'ornement de son troisième œil d'un geste rapide qui trahit sa nervosité.{/n} « J'étudie actuellement les archives laissées par le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} précédent du vaisseau, et lorsque j'ai voulu vérifier l'itinéraire jusqu'à Dargonus, j'ai découvert qu'il... ne correspondait pas à celui de l'Atlas. Il ne s'agit pas simplement d'une fluctuation mineure du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} : l'itinéraire a été supprimé, il n'est plus possible de le suivre. Ce qui rend ce phénomène réellement inquiétant, c'est qu'après vérification des autres routes consignées dans l'Atlas, je me suis rendu compte qu'elles étaient toutes affectées. Le Warp est en proie à une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}tempête menaçante{/g} qui fulmine de couleurs vives et hurlantes. Ces conditions n'entravent pas nos déplacements... mais elles ont rendu toutes nos connaissances existantes absolument inutiles. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, çabuk ve gergin bir hareketle üçüncü gözünün üzerindeki süsü düzeltiyor.{/n} "Geminin önceki {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'sının{/g} bıraktığı kayıtları inceliyordum. Dargonus rotasını tekrar gözden geçirmek istedim, bu sırada da bu yolun... Atlas'a kaydedilenle eşleşmediğini keşfettim. Küçük bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} dalgalanmasından fazlası söz konusu. Rota tamamen silinmiş, seyahat için kullanılabilmesi mümkün değil. Daha da beteri, Atlas'taki rotaları tek tek kontrol etmeye başladım ve hepsinde aynı şeyi gördüm. Öteboyut, canlı ve çığlık atan renklerin fışkırdığı {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}uğursuz bir fırtınayla{/g} çalkalanıyor. Hareketimize köstek olmaz lakin eldeki tüm verilerimiz işe yaramaz hâle geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia makes a quick nervous gesture, adjusting the adornment over her third eye.{/n} "I have been studying the records left by the vessel's previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. I wanted to double-check the route to Dargonus and discovered that... it does not match the one recorded in the Atlas. It is more than a minor {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuation — the route has been wiped out, it can no longer be used for travelling. To make matters worse, I started checking the paths from the Atlas, one after the other, and saw the same thing everywhere. The warp is roiling with an {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}ominous storm{/g}, bursting with vivid and screaming colours. It will not hinder our movement... But all previous knowledge is now utterly useless."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hızlı ve gergin bir beden hareketiyle üçüncü gözünün üzerindeki süsü düzeltiyor.{/n} "Geminin önceki {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'sı tarafından bırakılan kayıtlar üzerinde çalışıyordum. Dargonus'a giden yolu tekrar gözden geçirmek istemiştim ve bu sırada bu yolun Atlas'ta kaydedilenle eşleşmediğini keşfettim. Küçük bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} dalgalanmasından da daha fazlası söz konusu, rota tamamen silinmiş, yolculuk için kullanılamaz hâlde. Daha da kötüsü, Atlas'taki yolları tek tek kontrol etmeye başladım ve bütün yollar için aynı şey söz konusu. Öteboyut canlı ve çığlık atan renklerin fışkırdığı, uğursuz bir fırtınayla çalkalanıyor. Hareketimize köstek olmayacak ancak önceden sahip olduğumuz bilgiler artık hiçbir işimize yaramaz."
